overview: Tracks 1 to 14 :Recorded during the "Dress Me When I Bleed Tour 1995" 1. October 1995 at Batschkapp, Frankfurt (Germany) Tracks 15 to 30:Recorded during the "Fairyland Tour 1996". Tracks 31 to 37:Videoclips DVD also includes interviews, studio report and backstage impressions.
title: De/Vision - Pictures Of The Past
